title: Irish Stew
ingredients: 3pounds neck of lamb, trimmed of visible fat
4starchy potatoes, such as russets, white round, or Yukon gold, quartered
directions: 1. Preheat the oven to 325Â°F. Put the flour in a plastic bag and season well with salt and pepper. Add the lamb to the bag, tie the top, and shake well to coat. Do this in batches if necessary. Arrange the lamb in the bottom of a casserole dish.
2. Layer the onions, carrots, and potatoes on top of the lamb.
3. Sprinkle in the thyme and pour in the stock, then cover and cook in the preheated oven for 2 1/2 hours. Garnish with the parsley and serve straight from the casserole dish.
